articles.title: Deadly Texas Floods Sweep Away Dozens As Rescue Efforts Intensify ‚Äî WATCH
creator: ABP Live News
articles.description: Central Texas is reeling from catastrophic floods that struck with little warning, turning the weekend into a rescue operation. In a terrifying turn of events, floodwaters in parts of Texas surged so rapidly that the Guadalupe River rose by 26 feet in just 45 minutes, sweeping away homes, vehicles‚Äîand lives.Rescue teams spent Saturday scouring debris-laden waters from 27 young girls missing after being swept away from a Christian summer camp in Kerr County, one of the worst-hit areas. Officials confirmed 50 deaths across several counties, a toll expected to rise.üö®#BREAKING: Texas Parks and Wildlife have released footage from a helicopter of the Guadalupe River after the flooding......I have no wordsThe footage coming out of Texas looks so much like what happened here during Hurricane Helene.So awful.pic.twitter.com/9TqiVVFHVE‚Äî Matt Van Swol (@matt_vanswol) July 5, 2025Search And Rescue Operations Enter Critical PhaseAs of Saturday, 27 girls remain unaccounted for, prompting one of the largest multi-agency rescue efforts in recent state history. Emergency responders, including air, land, and water teams, continue to comb the flooded areas for survivors.Nim Kidd, Chief of the Texas Division of Emergency Management, expressed both urgency and resolve, ‚ÄúWe will continue the search until all those who are missing are found.‚ÄùCapsized RVs drift in Texas fatal floods https://t.co/ohCPUb7uMD pic.twitter.com/o531TTCh94‚Äî RT (@RT_com) July 6, 2025But with each passing hour, hopes of finding more survivors grow fainter. The torrent was so powerful it swept away entire homes, with videos from locals showing bare concrete slabs where houses once stood.Flood Warning Controversy Grows As More Rains Threaten Central TexasGovernor Greg Abbott has expanded the state disaster declaration and appealed to the federal government for additional support. The flooding has raised questions about the effectiveness of early warning systems, as many residents were caught off guard despite a ‚Äúmoderate‚Äù flood watch issued the previous day. South Dakota Governor Kristi Noem criticised the National Weather Service, stating the advisory didn‚Äôt reflect the severity of the impending danger. The National Weather Service (NWS) has forecast further rainfall, warning of additional flash flooding in rivers, creeks, and low-lying areas. The swollen Guadalupe, usually calm and inviting, is now a rushing force of destruction.Climate Change: A Growing ConcernFlash floods aren‚Äôt new to Texas, but scientists are increasingly linking their frequency and intensity to climate change. Warmer air holds more moisture, leading to heavier rainfall and a higher risk of rapid flooding‚Äîespecially in urban areas where soil absorption is poor. These dramatic scenes echo growing global concerns that human-driven climate change is turning seasonal rains into deadly events.

articles.title: Switzerland Reopens Tehran Embassy Amidst Air Tensions
articles.description: Switzerland Reopens Tehran Embassy Amidst Air Tensions Switzerland, acting as a representative for U.S. interests in Iran, has officially reopened its embassy in Tehran after its closure amidst escalating air hostilities between Israel and Iran, as confirmed by the Swiss foreign ministry on Sunday.Ambassador Nadine Olivieri Lozano, accompanied by a small diplomatic team, made their return to Tehran traveling overland through Azerbaijan, signaling a gradual resumption of their diplomatic activities.The embassy had ceased its operations on June 20 following increased regional tensions, but will now begin the process of full operational status.

articles.title: Ashish Rai elevated to CEO of Decorative Paints at JSW Paints
creator: afaqs! news bureau
articles.description: Ashish Rai, previously the Chief Business Officer ‚Äì Decorative Paints at JSW Paints, has taken charge as the Chief Executive Officer of the company‚Äôs decorative paints division, effective July 2025. Rai confirmed the development through an update on his LinkedIn profile.He now leads the decorative paints business with full profit and loss responsibility, marking a key leadership transition at the company.Rai brings over 20 years of experience spanning consumer goods, digital transformation, and B2B commerce. He joined JSW Paints in 2024, where he led sales and marketing operations for its decorative paints vertical.Prior to this, Rai spent more than 18 years at Unilever, holding senior roles across India, Asia, Africa, and Latin America. As Head of Distributive Trade Transformation, he oversaw digital initiatives across 23 markets, managing a business worth ‚Ç¨16 billion. Earlier, as Global Vice President ‚Äì Distributive Trade & B2B e-commerce, he led Unilever‚Äôs efforts to digitise small retail operations in key markets, focusing on increasing e-B2B adoption.He also served as Managing Director at Unilever Nepal, and held roles in modern trade, key accounts, and retail transformation.Rai began his professional journey as a software engineer at Infosys, before transitioning to FMCG sales at Colgate-Palmolive, where he worked in regional sales and account management.

articles.title: Zareen Khan recalls fangirl moment with Katrina Kaif at Race premiere: ‚ÄúI was just a wide-eyed fan‚Äù
articles.description: On July 5, 2025, actress Zareen Khan took a walk down memory lane as she shared a heartfelt throwback video from the early days of her life, before she became a Bollywood actor. In the video, a young Zareen can be seen beaming with excitement as she receives an autograph from Katrina Kaif at the premiere of the 2008 film Race.Taking to Instagram, Zareen captioned the clip with visible nostalgia: ‚ÄúOh my Goddd! Came across this video, and the memory is still so fresh. I clearly remember this moment... it‚Äôs from the premiere of the movie Race. Thanks to a friend who got us passes, we were able to experience the magic firsthand. At that point, I was just a wide-eyed fan, never imagining I‚Äôd one day be a part of the film industry.‚ÄùThe video captures a candid moment ‚Äî a starstruck Zareen, full of admiration, grinning ear to ear as she approaches Katrina for an autograph. Reflecting on the memory, she added, ‚ÄúBut look at how happy I am in this video, a total fangirl... grinning from ear to ear, getting an autograph from the woman I thought was and is breathtakingly beautiful!‚Äù View this post on Instagram A post shared by Zareen Khan ????????‚ú®???????? (@zareenkhan)Interestingly, after her Bollywood debut with Veer in 2010, Zareen Khan was often compared to Katrina Kaif due to their striking resemblance, a comparison that followed her throughout the early phase of her career.Also Read: EXCLUSIVE: Zareen Khan reveals her ‚ÄúFirsts,‚Äù from job to rejection; recalls people having ‚Äúproblem with her existence‚Äù after Veer released

articles.title: UGC NET June 2025 Answer Key Released, Click Here For Direct Link
creator: ABP Live Education
articles.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the provisional answer key for the UGC NET June 2025 examination, providing candidates with an opportunity to review their responses and estimate their scores. The answer key, along with recorded responses and question papers, is now available at the official website: ugcnet.nta.ac.in.How to Access UGC NET Answer KeyTo view and download the answer key:Visit ugcnet.nta.ac.inClick on the ‚ÄúUGC NET June 2025 Answer Key‚Äù linkLog in using your application number and date of birth/passwordDownload the provisional answer key and response sheetObjection Window Open Till July 8The NTA has also opened the objection window, allowing candidates to challenge any answer they believe is incorrect. The window will remain open until July 8, 2025, 5 PM. A non-refundable fee of ‚Çπ200 per question is applicable for each objection raised.Candidates must provide supporting documents or references, such as academic textbooks or research papers, to substantiate their claims. Objections without valid references or pending payment will not be considered. No correction facility will be provided after submission, so candidates are advised to cross-check question IDs and answer details carefully.Final Answer Key And Result AwaitedOnce the objection window closes, a panel of subject matter experts will evaluate the challenges. If any objection is found valid, the final answer key will be revised. The UGC NET result 2025 is expected shortly after the final key is published.
